We've got a fresh challenge for the bitcointalk community!"Â  ðŸ§    Hello everyone,While most major football tournaments are on hold until the end of summer, we couldn't resist bringing you another football challenge.This time, we have a couple of matches from the Euro U21 tournament. It might be challenging, but we know our community loves it all.How to participate:- Predict the 1 / X / 2 of each match- Include your vbetFTN userID in your reply- One correct answer gets you +1 point to the leaderboard- Any participant who has the most correct answers takes the prize pool- For the tiebreaker guess the total goals scored for all the matches combinedRewards:- 1st: $50 free bet- 2nd: $30 free bet- 3rd: $20 free betMatches:- Georgia U21 vs Belgium U21- Portugal U21 vs Netherlands U21- Romania U21 vs Ukraine U21- Spain U21 vs Croatia U21So let's give it a try!
